name: PonyProg Device File
summary: Learn about .E2P files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The E2P file is the main file used by PonyProg to store serial device information. PonyProg creates the E2P file when you select File â†’ Save Device File. You can also save device information in a .BIN, .HEX, .CSM, .MOT, .ROM, or .EEP file.

PonyProg allows you to program serial devices like Microwire, Microchip PIC micro, Atmel AVR, and SPI eeprom. It is used in consumer, automotive, telecommunication, and industrial applications with nonvolatile memory storage.

description: An E2P file is a device file used by PonyProg, a free universal programmer for serial devices. It contains a configuration of a device, which includes the device type, security bits, and notes associated with the device.
